content: Maxime, you raise an interesting and valid point about ETL. The ETL tools seem to have a whole market of their own, while code is still the best abstraction and provides scalability, flexibility and reusability. I recently put the argument forward of using frameworks such as Apache Spark for this purpose, check my presentation at the Spark Summit: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vZhSbs1xLx4&t=1s. Would love to hear your opinion about this!
